main event: A witness observed a bright pulsating light that changed from white to orange in color on the southwest horizon.
interesting points: The light remained stationary for approximately 1 hour.
The light suddenly accelerated and disappeared from view in a matter of seconds.
The witness was unable to determine the exact altitude or distance of the object from the observation point.
The sighting occurred during the night hours of May 4, 1968.
The report was not made until December 1968, several months after the incident.
sighted object: a bright pulsating light that changed from white to orange
